ads_not_blocking:

bug_game_stop: Attention! This game is disabled because it is endangering the server!
delete_gd_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the data stored by the game from your browser and restart the game?

Please upgrade to the latest release of phpBB Arcade!

err.8: This game is not usable here!

error_game_data: The game data can’t be found!

fullscreen_no_support: Full screen mode isn’t supported by this browser!
game_gdpr:
Attention!

This game wants to load files from external sites. This behavior could endanger the security of your personal data.

Affected site(s):
%s

Please read our privacy policy for these websites. If there is no description of these websites in our privacy policy, please report this game to an administrator, as this will violate our privacy policy and the GDPR.

game_pp_confirm: I have read and accept the Privacy Policy for the game.
